subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jonas Jerebko scored 20 points as Detroit, which had lost five straight at home, dropped the Nets to 4-46, on pace for the worst record in N.B.A. history.
snippet: Jonas Jerebko scored 20 points as Detroit, which had lost five straight at home, dropped the Nets to 4-46, on pace for the worst record in N.B.A. history.
